issue.title: Ignition GUI: Links in the image selection dropdown menu are mixed up

content.raw:
Thanks, I believe I have reproduced this issue.  It seems the pose for the cameras on the X1 Config 5 are backwards - the left HD camera is on the right and vice versa.  Is this the issue you were referring to?  If so, I've alerted the team and a fix will be issued as soon as possible.  If not, please describe more specifically which vehicle configurations were loaded, possibly with a gif of the issue, and more specific steps to reproduce this issue.  I loaded in multiple dual-camera robots simultaneously and everything seemed to be find other than the X1's cameras being reversed.

Thanks for helping us find these types of issues!
content.html:
Thanks, I believe I have reproduced this issue. It seems the pose for the cameras on the X1 Config 5 are backwards - the left HD camera is on the right and vice versa. Is this the issue you were referring to? If so, I've alerted the team and a fix will be issued as soon as possible. If not, please describe more specifically which vehicle configurations were loaded, possibly with a gif of the issue, and more specific steps to reproduce this issue. I loaded in multiple dual-camera robots simultaneously and everything seemed to be find other than the X1's cameras being reversed.

Thanks for helping us find these types of issues!
